name: PollyDestroyer
description:
Embark on a journey through the cosmos with PollyDestroyer, a riveting 2D space shooter that combines classic arcade action with modern design. As the universe's last hope, you'll pilot the formidable PollyDestroyer, a spacecraft equipped with devastating weaponry and advanced technology, to fend off an onslaught of alien adversaries determined to conquer every corner of the galaxy.

Key Features


Combat: Engage in epic space battles against various alien foes.

Diverse Arsenal: Customize your spacecraft with powerful weapons. From rapid-fire blasters to explosive missiles, equip your ship to suit your combat style.

Levels: Navigate through increasingly challenging levels, presenting new challenges and formidable enemies. In future updates, you can explore asteroid fields, brave nebula storms, and infiltrate enemy strongholds in your quest to save the galaxy.

Progressive Difficulty: Whether you're a rookie pilot or a seasoned space ranger, PollyDestroyer offers a scalable difficulty curve that provides a challenging yet accessible gameplay experience for all skill levels.

PollyDestroyer invites you to a thrilling space adventure where strategy, reflexes, and a will of steel are your keys to victory. Do you have what it takes to defend the galaxy from the brink of destruction? Strap in, power up, and blast off into the action!

Planned Features

  • Steam Achievements,
  • Online Multiplayer Modes (PvP, PvP Teams, Co-Op Waves),
  • Leaderboards,
  • More Ship Customisation,
  • More Ship Weapons and Upgrades.
  • New enemies and obstacles

Note to Players: PollyDestroyer is an early-access title with regular updates to enhance gameplay and introduce new features. Join our Steam community to stay informed about the latest developments and share your feedback to shape the game's future.
